title: ONE-PAN LASAGNA
directions: You need to first mix together the sauce. Pour the can of diced tomatoes in a measuring cup. Add enough water so it measures 4 cups. Stir in the tomato sauce and the sugar, set aside
In a large skillet, heat up the olive oil on medium heat
Add the garlic and stir for 30 seconds
Add the meat until it’s browned — drain the grease
Season with a sprinkle of garlic salt and pepper
Add the 2 tablespoons of Italian Seasonings and stir
Pour the pasta on top followed by the tomato mixture – do not stir
Cover and bring to a simmer
Reduce heat to medium-low and stir every 5 minutes
Cook for 20 minutes or until the pasta is tender
Remove from heat and top with the mozzarella cheese and parmesan cheese
Cover and let rest for 5 minutes until the cheese is melted
ingredients: You are here: Home / Mom / Food / One-Pan Lasagna
Making lasagna can sometimes seem pretty overwhelming. Enough so, we don’t even want to tackle it. But this One-Pan Lasagna will change your perception of making the popular dish.
I love that if you closed your eyes, you would seriously think you are eating a traditional lasagna that you spent the entire day making. But this one is so much easier.
